name: Heart of Nature by Kristjana S. Williams

metadata.name: HAPPY X ADVENTUROUS HEART OF NATURE
metadata.description:
'Head in the Clouds' is an imaginative NFT project by Kristjana S. Williams inspired by the heightened emotions associated with the act of travelling, from joy and anticipation to impatience and nervous excitement. ‘Heart of Nature’, 'Contemplating Skeleton’, and ‘Drifting Skeleton’, the three collections that feature in the project, reflect how these emotions are deeply felt, as travelling opens up the mind and body to new possibilities and heightens appreciation of the natural world. The emotions and sensations are represented through different colours and animations, creating a beautiful and surreal layer of moving imagery to the core artworks, from floating clouds, flying birds and butterflies to unfurling flowers, shoots, and mushrooms.

‘Head in the Clouds’ NFTs are subject to the Terms of Use available here: https://www.vivearts.com/terms-of-use
